item.title: Join RPI’s Red & White Student Organization, apply by Sept. 12
item.description: Be part of RPI tradition! The Red & White Student Organization connects students with alumni, leads tours, and promotes school pride. Gain experience, friendships, and a chance to represent RPI. Apply by Sept. 12: https://forms.gle/14Trz9VS23FgD4iq6
item.author: Students

item.title: Cognitive Science Undergraduate Information Session | Sept. 13
item.description: Are you considering a major or dual-major in Cognitive Science, Psychological Science, or Philosophy? Please join us on Wednesday, September 3 in Carnegie 113 at 12pm for FREE PIZZA! Learn about degree requirements, dual-major opportunities, the BS+MS co-term program, and hear about active research going on in the Cognitive Science department from faculty and graduate students. You will also learn about opportunities to get involved in research through the Undergraduate Research Program (URP).
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD & Haleon Info Session | Sept. 16
item.description: On Tuesday, 9/16, Haleon (a local employer) will be on campus to discuss their student programs and opportunities for co-ops, internships, and rotational roles. The event will be held from 5:30-7:30pm. Join the CCPD and Haleon for this exciting event just for RPI students! Registration and additional details are available in Handshake.

item.description: Date: Saturday, September 13, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Join Club Rugby, Ultimate Frisbee, and Quadball at Field Day to meet all five teams and try all three sports! All sports are co-ed and compete regionally! Undergrad and grad students welcome!

item.title: Ways to help the RPI Student Pantry
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 10, 2025 11:00 AM - Thu , September 11, 2025 12:00 PM - The Student Pantry accepts donations of non perishable food items and personal hygiene items. The pantry can also use reusable bags. Donations can be dropped off at 1525 15th ST (off-campus Commons) or email offcampus@rpi.edu to schedule a pick up.

item.description:
